creator: andrew.punch@247realmedia.com
text:
AC_MSG_NOTICE is not in autoconf 2.13 but it is being used
by buildconf which specifies an AC_PREREQ(2.13)

More information is available in this mail message:
http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/httpd-dev/200701.mbox/%3C4be80d840701031354o32c662e8g20e55a86ae55de27@mail.gmail.com%3E

The following message indicates that the problem was fixed in trunk, however I have observed that the problem is not fixed in the 2.2.x branch.

creator: andrew.punch@247realmedia.com
text:
Created attachment 26654
Backport of AC_PREREQ() patch
